=== Kernel Team ===
* Call for testing of Linux 2.6.27 sent out
* Kernel team is tracking known upstream regressions in 2.6.27 <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.kernel.org/showdependencytree.cgi?id=11167&hide_resolved=1]]</nowiki>
* Regressions reported against Linux 2.6.27 by Ubuntu users are also tracked: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bugs?field.tag=regression-2.6.27]]</nowiki>
** fglrx, nvidia are tracked as regressions by the team, but are not considered blockers for 2.6.27 in intrepid
* A <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/KernelTeam/2.6.27-kernel-plan|fallback plan]]</nowiki> is in place in the event 2.6.27 is not ok for intrepid
* pgraner and heno_ have a call later to discuss hardware certification against 2.6.27
